attributes.action: visitors & students should pay £8000 entry deposit
attributes.additional_details: £8000 entry deposit for students and visitors to the UK on entry and should only be refunded if the visa conditions haven't been breached, by applying this law to illegal immigrants there will be less immigrants, and they should be electronically tagged and have there passports detained and returned on the plane back to there destination without a overstay like this instead of UK border staff chasing the immigrants out from work and homes by tagging them they will know if the stay was genuine by checking there whereabouts electronically less hassle for everyone.
